/>
VI.ii.1.B.5.a
.
Finality of Election of DEA
If Dependents’ Educational Assistance (DEA) has been elected and payment has been received by the surviving child, the election is final and DIC benefits may not be restored or reelected.
Reference
:  For information on the finality of an election of DEA, see
38 CFR 21.3023(c)(1)
.
title: M21-1, Part VI, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section B - Miscellaneous Election Issues
citation: Part VI, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section B
